name: Luminesce
description:
Welcome to LUMINESCE, fly through the neon skies collecting gems and shooting all the enemies that come your way! 

Itch donations very very much appreciated, but not required.  If this game gets enough love I might consider making more content and putting it on steam. Thank you for playing! <3

CONTROLS

Menu keyboard: WASD/Arrow keys, Shift to select

Menu controller: Dpad, X/A to select

Game keyboard: WASD/Arrow keys to move, Shift for special ability when charged.

Game controller: Left stick/Dpad to move, X for special ability when charged.

Try and get a high score... if you dare

SOCIALS

Youtube: (1) Spacespy - YouTube 

Twitter: (3) spacespyTV (@spacespy_tv) / Twitter

Discord: (3) spacespyTV (@spacespy_tv) / Twitter
